SELECT u.user_id AS userId, u.user_name AS userName, u.user_email AS userEmail, u.user_phone AS userPhone, u.user_birthday AS userBirthday, u.user_role AS userRole, CASE u.user_role WHEN 'USER' THEN '일반회원' WHEN 'ADMIN' THEN '관리자' WHEN 'SUSPENDED' THEN '정지회원' ELSE '알수없음' END AS userRoleName, COALESCE(r.total_report_count, 0) AS reportCount, u.user_enrolldate AS userEnrollDate FROM user u
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_report_count FROM ( SELECT user_id FROM reported_post UNION ALL SELECT user_id FROM reported_review ) combined_reports GROUP BY user_id ) r ON u.user_id = r.user_id
WHERE 1=1
AND u.user_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search.searchValue}, '%')
AND u.user_email LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search.searchValue}, '%')
AND u.user_enrolldate >= #{search.startDate}
AND u.user_enrolldate <= #{search.endDate}
AND u.user_role IN
'USER'
'SUSPENDED'
'ADMIN'
AND COALESCE(r.total_report_count, 0) > 0
AND COALESCE(r.total_report_count, 0) = 0
ORDER BY reportCount DESC LIMIT #{search.size} OFFSET #{search.offset}

WHERE 1=1
